arabic_text: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَأۡمَ۬نَّا عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَنَٰصِحُونَ
translation: They said, “O our father, why do you not trust us with Joseph[5], although we truly care for him?
footnotes: [5] They formulated their challenging scheme carefully, in order to throw their father off guard.
